2.name: Always in your phone
2.title: Your business card is always in your phone
2.text:
Drop has perfected contact exchange by making everything as simple as snapping an image of someones business card
  • We send a text message with your contact details to your acquaintance
  • Drop extracts and processes all the card details and saves them in a new Contact for you

3.name: Social and business events
3.title: Social and business events
3.text:
Drop matches* everyone who is located in the same vicinity, and allows users to:
  • A speaker can connect and share data with hundreds of user simultaneously using SPEAKER MODE
  • Users can exchange data amongst each other.
3.link: * Using ResonanceTM, a unique patented technology.

4.name: Features
4.title: Drop features, free-to-use
4.text:
• Auto-saves incoming shared contacts into the devices telephone book
  • Multiple Business Cards for any occasion
  • Creates geotags to remind where the introduction was made
  • Search through specific criteria
  • A large selection of Business Card Design Templates

5.name: Enterprise features
5.title: Drop enterprise service features
5.text:
• A unique and custom card design for your company
  • An "Auto-Create" feature for new employees’ business cards with AD/IM integration
  • A corporate CRM where all new contacts made by employees are saved automatically
  • individual employees vCard’s with constant web URL’s on your company’s Domain, i.e. http://smith.yourdomain.com

6.title: Download app
6.description: Try it right now! Download DROP on your device, drop the cards and start connecting!
